Caption: Invitation to the sixth convocation (cover)
Description: The sixth convocation invitation card was simple and formal. It was made using firm cartridge paper that was cream coloured. On the cover, the details of the convocation (the name of the institute, sixth convocation and date) were printed in black ink using the Wedding Text BT-Regular font. The Institute emblem is also printed on the top in black ink. Dimensions of the cover: 17.5 cm Ã— 12.8 cm
